descriptionHtml:
Sephiroth\'s Masamune
Now you can have epic duels against the Buster sword! 
(http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2699)

Sword can be purchased from Eorlund, or it can be crafted (it\'s found in the daedric category).
Can be improved at the grindstones and enchanted.

I enlarged the handle to make it fit better in the hands, and i did edit the textures a bit.
Sorry, no blood layer for now, the sword is so long the vanilla blood looks stupid on it since it 
stretches, i\'ll see if i can make a custom texture for the layer.

UPDATE:
Added a new file, now there\'s a one-handed version! Increased the base damage a bit, made it craftable only at the Skyforge, changed the ingredients to: steel ingots, dragon scale, daedric greatsword (or daedric sword for one-handed version), diamond. Thanks to redhorizon99 and exsess for the ideas.

INSTALLATION:
Drop the Data folder in your Skyrim directory, then open the Skyrim launcher and click \"Data 
files\". Be sure that the Masamune.esp is checked, then activate \"load loose files\".

Credits:
The meshes and textures are from LordMaddog\'s Fantasy Mod 
(http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=10416)

Thanks to Jaysus for the tutorial.
Thanks to Ghogiel for the continuos support.
Thanks to Waaaghbafet for some tips on the STAT values.
Thanks to Samutz in the Bethesda\'s forum for the smithing tutorial.
And to everyone in the Nexus forum.
author: Phate3
